Module com.example.cs230
Package CS230.items

Class Loot

java.lang.Object
CS230.items.Item
CS230.items.Loot
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cent, Diamond, Dollar, Ruby
public abstract class Loot extends Item
Abstract class that constructs a general Loot object, used as a general template for more specific loot objects
Version:
1.0
Author:
Marek Jezinski
